content: Write a limerick using at least seven words that rhyme with "rain".

In the town of Sunshine, one day,
It didn't rain, nor did it play.
The flowers did faint,
Under the blazing saint,
As the clouds just stayed far away.

(Here, "day", "play", "rain", "saint", "away" rhyme with "rain", and "faint" also rhymes, making seven words in total.)
